extendedInfo.description: Math Genius Trainer â An addictive math brain puzzle game.Boost your brain skills. Improve your observation, focus, concentration and memory abilities.Challenge your brain in infinite levels, speed up your ability to perform calculation quickly.Bring out the hidden genius in you with this mathematic exercises.Amazing app to keep the brain in shape.Fun way to solve math problems.Math Genius Trainer is one of the best mathematic, logic puzzles and mind games available! It is a great brain exercise, math workout, IQ test, logic games, mental workout, brain puzzle, mathematics game, brain teaser, educational puzzle, party game, game for adults, game for children and family game. If you love to play card games, or tile games like scrabble, mahjong, dominoes; or strategy games like checkers and chess, you will love to play this fun math puzzle game.The human brain is able to continually adapt and rewire itself, even at an old age, it can grow new neurons. Severe mental decline is usually caused by diseasess, whereas most age-related losses in memory or motor skills simply result from inactivity and a lack of mental exercise and stimulation. In other words, use it or lose it. And this is your chance to use it, in this brain exercise.Search categories: maths games, quick calculation exercises, brainiac, math for kids, brain workout, brain fitness, games for children, math tricks, math for kids, math reference, calculation games, free puzzles, kids games, smart games, solitary games, free games, IQ exercises, math workout, math help, education game,brain teaser, numbers, logic games, kid games, elementary math, mind game, free fun game, math help, fun games for free, fun games for kids, rain exercises, IQ tests, math skills.

reviews.title: Amazing game
reviews.comment: I don\'t know exactly if this improves your brain but the GAME itself is pretty addiction.  What would make this game even better... would be adding a mode where you can only click anything from a one square radius of your INITIAL click.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: The best game ever the one and only best game for my kids nah not really it alright, my youngest 13 got 940 on hard how good is that.
reviews.author: Melissa Taylor

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Loving this game...Nice to work my math skills...thanx for a change from the gems!!! Great for kids to learn and keep their skills sharp.
reviews.author: Audrey Housworth

reviews.title: This game is Awesome!!!
reviews.comment: Its very addicting which is good if you enjoy learning! Love it! They just need to put some better music
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Super nice. Good for improving quick calculation.
reviews.author: Harke Bahadur

reviews.title: ADDictive without being AD-Dick-tive!!!
reviews.comment: It All ADDs UP!  And yet, the Ads Do NOT Hinder game play, which is pleasantly NOT Frustrating...   ADDictive without being AD-Dick-tive!!!   (I should do ADDvertising for them, eh?  Hire me!  PR0.Fusion)

reviews.title: Great Game!
reviews.comment: Fun game to play during spare time. Plus, it really strengthens your mental math skills! :D

reviews.title: Nat
reviews.comment: Good game. No bugs so far.Trying to improve my math skills. Just started playing so I will only give it 4 stars

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: I love this! It\'s such a great way to start the day or before you do skl work

reviews.title: Speed trainer!
reviews.comment: Good to make quick calculations and improve reaction time. Would have liked that incorporated other types of games or maybe different presentation to kept me more.engaged.

reviews.title: Howard the brainy box
reviews.comment: Trying to use same colour numbers makes this game very challenging. Great brain exercise.

reviews.title: Nice app!
reviews.comment: I just love numbers, and I love this game! I highly recommend this game for children, this will definitely improve their skills in mental calculations.

reviews.title: wowie!!
reviews.comment: Love it! even the music! it creates soothing mayhem for my brain! I like growing neurons!

reviews.title: Maths games
reviews.comment: Over all it\'s not a bad game, worth having for a pass the time.
reviews.author: Sean Angus

reviews.title: Great game but needs update
reviews.comment: Game plays well but on tablet on level 1 bottom row of numbers hide under status bar please add auto screen resize then will rate 5 star.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Math game
reviews.comment: It\'s a good brain tester! It is good for young and old. If u need to brush up on math skills, this game will do it! I\'d recommend it to kids for school!

reviews.title: Fun Game!
reviews.comment: Allows too much time to select answer. Would be nice to adjust the timing.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good use of my time
reviews.comment: This is a good application and keeps my brain activity going, and I seem to be more productive because of it. I only wish it had different puzzles.

reviews.comment: a 4th grader can do this simple math I LOVE MY WIFE thanks babedoll

reviews.title: Fun training game
reviews.comment: My son was competing in a math tournament and used this app to prepare before the competition. He really liked it and said it made him feel prepared and zen-like. He\'s 10
